org.jdesktop.swingx
Enum ScrollableSizeHint

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ScrollableSizeHint>
      org.jdesktop.swingx.ScrollableSizeHint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ScrollableSizeHint>
public enum ScrollableSizeHint
extends Enum<ScrollableSizeHint>

Sizing hints for layout, useful f.i. in a Scrollable implementation.

Inspired by Rob Camick.

PENDING JW: naming... suggestions?
KS: I'd go with TrackingHint or ScrollableTrackingHint, since it is used in getScrollableTracksViewportXXX.

Author:
Jeanette Winzenburg, Karl Schaefer

Enum Constant Summary
FIT
          Size should be adjusted to parent size.
HORIZONTAL_STRETCH
          Deprecated. 
MINIMUM_STRETCH
          Stretches the component when its parent is larger than its minimum size.
NONE
          Size should be unchanged.
PREFERRED_STRETCH
          Stretches the component when its parent is larger than its preferred size.
VERTICAL_STRETCH
          Deprecated.

Enum Constant Detail

NONE

public static final ScrollableSizeHint NONE
Size should be unchanged.

FIT

public static final ScrollableSizeHint FIT
Size should be adjusted to parent size.

MINIMUM_STRETCH

public static final ScrollableSizeHint MINIMUM_STRETCH
Stretches the component when its parent is larger than its minimum size.

PREFERRED_STRETCH

public static final ScrollableSizeHint PREFERRED_STRETCH
Stretches the component when its parent is larger than its preferred size.

HORIZONTAL_STRETCH

@Deprecated
public static final ScrollableSizeHint HORIZONTAL_STRETCH
Deprecated. 
Width should be stretched to parent width if smaller, unchanged otherwise.

VERTICAL_STRETCH

@Deprecated
public static final ScrollableSizeHint VERTICAL_STRETCH
Deprecated. 
Width should be stretched to parent height if smaller, unchanged otherwise.
